title: Fun but...
text: The adds are way too much. I can handle adds but not in the middle of a level. The game also crashed twice within 10min of play. I deleted it

title: Recent update

text: Ads. After each level an ad. During each level, guess what? An ad! Can we get games that don‚Äôt force ads on you??

title: It was good until they started putting ads after every small level
text: It was an alright game, until they started putting ads after every small level. Not only that the ads also freeze and I have to restart the app.

title: Ad ad ad ad ad ad ad ad ad
text:
Downloaded this a couple of weeks ago and thought it was fun, different, quirky, good for a few minutes at a time. 

Latest update has ruined it. Ads used to play at the end of each level. Unpleasant, but bearable. Now they‚Äôve changed it to play ads every 20s even in the middle of a game. Ad finishes, return to game, and it doesn‚Äôt register movement and thus fall of the platform; want to continue? Watch an ad. Restart level? Watch an ad. Complete the level? Watch an ad. 

Was fun while it lasted; but now delete.

title: Repeating levels- Very generic
text: Fun game but levels are obviously auto-generated using the same few concepts and map layouts and end up repeating themselves alot, unlike most games that have unique and progressively more difficult levels

title: Was fun until now!
text: Game was super fun! I‚Äôd even put up with the annoying ads at the end of each round, but now the ads are popping while you‚Äôre playing. Yikes!! Fix it or it‚Äôs deleted.

title: Bad
text: I use to love this game until you just had to put the ads in while you are playing the game it makes no since just horrible horrible horrible!!! Unacceptable...Period...Deleting app!!!

title: Ads in the middle of a level
text: This game was fun and I really enjoyed it until the last update. Now there are ads in the middle of a level. I would understand ads at the end but this is unacceptable. Deleting the app from my phone.

title: Push Em All
text: Fun game , it‚Äôll entertain you. They use an advertisements like all free games but these petty fools pander advertising in the middle of gameplay. Play it long enough it will. Games like this the developers care less about the game itself because it‚Äôs being played so greed sets in and BAM an advertisement while you actually have gameplay going on. After this review I‚Äôll check back for an ‚Äúanswer‚Äù on why ... stay tuned ....

title: Adds
text: Wayyyyyyyy toooo many adds.  Gets boring. Even in the middle of the level you‚Äôre playing. Had to delete.  BORRRRRRIIIINNNNGGGGGG

title: Used to be good
text: This game used to be great. There was an ad between every level which I didn‚Äôt mind. The recent update has an ad every two sections, which equates to multiple ads per level. It‚Äôs ridiculous, it‚Äôs not even worth playing anymore.

title: Too many ads!
text: I understand that free apps need to have ads, but playing multiple ads in the middle of levels in addition to the ads between levels is just ridiculous. I used to enjoy this game, but I just can't put up with the constant obnoxious advertisements anymore.

title: Was great
text: Now I understand having ads, but after this last update it‚Äôs ridiculous.  It was between every level, now you get them between levels AND halfway through the level.  Done with this game now

title: Version 1.7 update ruins the game
text:
I really liked this game. It is very simple and easy to master but something about ‚Äúcleaning‚Äù everything off the level is very satisfying. It does contain ads in between levels but that‚Äôs to be expected on a free game. At least the ads are skipable after a couple of seconds. 

Then they released the 1.7 update. This update added a store where you could by different skins for your character. No problem with that, earning in game currency is easy. 

The thing that breaks the game, and I‚Äôm uninstalling it after this review, is that they‚Äôve now put ads in the middle of the level. Not just before or after a level, but actually in the MIDDLE OF GAMEPLAY. You‚Äôll be moving along clearing enemies and suddenly the screen will start playing a video. You switch tilt your phone sideways and wait for the X to appear to close the ad. Then you‚Äôre dropped back into gameplay just in time to see your character fall off a cliff. But don‚Äôt worry! You can just watch ANOTHER ad to save your progress!

I have no problem with ads in a free game. I can either endure it or pay to remove them. My choice. But these ads completely break the game. Your serene little sweeping expedition keeps getting interrupted by jarring ads that get you killed. 

Don‚Äôt bother. Don‚Äôt download. Definitely don‚Äôt pay for it.

title: Used to b fun
